Monvvo Mortgage Calculator Disclaimer

Monvvo provides this mortgage calculator as a tool for users to estimate potential monthly mortgage payments. While we strive to ensure the accuracy and reliability of the information presented, it is important to understand the following:

For Informational Purposes Only

The mortgage payment estimates generated by this calculator are for general informational purposes only. These estimates are not intended to be financial advice, a loan offer, or a guarantee of actual mortgage payments.

No Client or Fiduciary Relationship

The use of this tool does not create a client, advisory, or fiduciary relationship between you and Monvvo or any of its affiliates. Monvvo does not act as a financial advisor, mortgage lender, or legal consultant, and no information provided by this tool should be interpreted as professional advice or consultation.

Explicit Non-Liability

By using this tool, you acknowledge and agree that Monvvo, its employees, partners, and affiliates are not liable for any financial decisions, actions, losses, or damages resulting from the use or interpretation of the calculator’s outputs. The results provided by this tool are estimates only and are not guaranteed to be accurate or applicable to your specific financial situation.

Assumptions and Simplifications

The calculator uses user-provided inputs and assumptions regarding interest rates, property taxes, insurance, and other variables. These factors are subject to change and may vary based on the lender, location, and specific circumstances.

No Guarantee of Accuracy

While we make every effort to provide accurate and up-to-date information, Monvvo does not guarantee the completeness, accuracy, or reliability of the results. External factors, such as changes in property taxes, HOA fees, or insurance premiums, may affect the actual payment.

Affirmation of User Responsibility

It is your responsibility to verify the accuracy of the calculator’s results with a licensed financial or mortgage professional before making any financial decisions. The tool is meant to assist in understanding potential mortgage payments but should not be relied upon as the sole basis for decisions.

Use at Your Own Risk

The use of this calculator is entirely at your own risk. Monvvo shall not be held liable for any discrepancies, financial decisions, or outcomes resulting from the use of this tool.

Updates and Changes

Monvvo reserves the right to update the mortgage calculator or this disclaimer at any time without prior notice. Users are encouraged to verify information and assumptions each time they use the tool.

Important

For personalized mortgage estimates or advice, we strongly recommend contacting a licensed mortgage professional. This calculator is intended to assist in understanding mortgage payments but should not be the sole basis for financial decisions.

Contact Us

If you have questions about the Monvvo Mortgage Calculator, feel free to reach out to us at info@monvvo.com.
